attributes.title: this app gave me night terrors😩
attributes.review: DA like seriously don’t get this app if u enjoy sleeping fr. i was just gonna download it bc i can’t vote and wanted to support but then upon opening the app i saw a baby cheeto and passed out. that night i had incredible night terrors about said cheeto and ever since i haven’t been able to sleep🥴

attributes.title: MAGA CULT CAME FOR ME
attributes.review: I wanted to support the rotten Cheeto so I got this app🥰😍🤗 but after it downloaded there was a knock at my door🤔🤭 I opened it and a whole MAGA cult broke into my house and tried to convert me😳 when I wouldn’t put on the cursed devil hat and support the anti christ trump they kidnapped me😭😱 and they took me to Area 51 and fed me to the aliens👽👽👽i do not recommend this experience 0/10.💀👽

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app has over taken my phone. All it does is change all of my pictures to images of trump and his tiny croissant. Im just trying to post images of me and my lesbian chines girlfriend and it almost deleted all of my photos. Also this is false advertising for a failure of a man.

attributes.title: Worst app ever used
attributes.review: My wonderful daughter downloaded this app onto her phone just so she could see what it was about and this app continually drained her account, it deleted other apps off her phone, got her info leaked, and harassed her. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! and while your at it don’t support the racist, homophobic, sexist, rapist, Cheeto lookin president either! Vote him out 2020!

attributes.title: Needs an update ASAP
attributes.review: ✨💕🧚‍♂️💗As soon as I downloaded this app my phone started glitching and turning my screen into a wet Cheeto. 💕🧚‍♂️✨All I wanted to do was support our racist and white supremacist president because I obviously want him for another 4 years so we can lose more brain cells. 🙈💖💙 So please update and vote him out of office. 💗🧚‍♂️✨💕

attributes.title: Throughly disappointed
attributes.review: I love Donald trump❤️ but upon opening this app I received a message, a message from above. It was as if someone were whispering yet screaming in my ear saying “stop don’t touch me there this is my no no square” And I feel as though this was a sign  given to me. I will no longer support Donald trump nor respect him.

attributes.title: Very horrible
attributes.review: When you open the app the first thing you see is him🤢 which is disgusting. Very ugly colors should have never put in the Apple store if I could rate zero stars I would. If this was his way of getting people to vote for him went about it all wrong🥱 try again🥳

DONT GET. this app is horrible I couldn’t even find the toupee trump uses when I called them several times. Not to mention when I climbed through the window of the White House they attacked me and all I wanted was to find his toupee myself. Leave a one star or I’ll climb through your window too 🙃.

attributes.title: Really? Waste of space on my phone
attributes.review: Not only was this app just terrible but the person in represents is also terrible. I downloaded because I thought it would give me some insight onto how someone could be so awful but really all it did was solidify my opinion.

attributes.title: Terrible do not download
attributes.review:
This has to be one of the WORST apps to ever be programmed. Just opening the app caused myself and my family to violently convulse 

As well as the weird ambient noise that can be heard the entire time you’re on the app. Absolutely terrifying, sounds like breathing. 

And then to top everything off I find out it’s actively accessing my camera and viewing me without my permission. Like if you wanted to see me that bad you’re gonna have to give up some coin. 

But seriously do not ever get this app. It causes virus’ and generational trauma
